items.name: Riddick
items.description: Left for dead on a sun-scorched planet, Riddick finds himself up against an alien race of predators.

items.name: Moonlight
items.description: A young African-American man grapples with his identity and sexuality while experiencing the everyday struggles of childhood, adolescence, and burgeoning adulthood.

items.name: Band of Brothers
items.description: The story of Easy Company of the U.S. Army 101st Airborne Division and their mission in World War II Europe, from Operation Overlord to V-J Day.

items.name: Dune
items.description: A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis to free their desert world from the emperor's rule.

items.name: Ja zuster, nee zuster
items.description: A cheerful stylized musical comedy, the story takes place in the guest-house of sister Klivia. The inhabitants are cheerful and good-hearted, but when the grumpy neighbor Boordevol discovers that one of the inhabitants is a former thief, he attempts to have the guest-house shut down.

items.name: The Fellowship of the Ring
items.description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

items.name: Star Wars VII. The Force Awakens
items.description: As a new threat to the galaxy rises, Rey, a desert scavenger, and Finn, an ex-stormtrooper, must join Han Solo and Chewbacca to search for the one hope of restoring peace.

items.name: Manos: The Hands of Fate
items.description: A family gets lost on the road and stumbles upon a hidden, underground, devil-worshiping cult led by the fearsome Master and his servant Torgo.

items.name: La haine
items.description: 24 hours in the lives of three young men in the French suburbs the day after a violent riot.

items.name: Slurf, de domme smurf
items.description: Slurf komt erachter dat alle andere smurfen broekjes dragen. Donnie legt hem uit waarom.

items.name: Jaws
items.description: When a massive killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community off Long Island, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.

items.name: Life of Brian
items.description: Born on the original Christmas in the stable next door to Jesus Christ, Brian of Nazareth spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.

items.name: Serenity
items.description: The crew of the ship Serenity try to evade an assassin sent to recapture telepath River.

items.name: La cit√© des enfants perdus
items.description: A scientist in a surrealist society kidnaps children to steal their dreams, hoping that they slow his aging process.

items.name: The Godfather
items.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

items.name: The Shawshank Redemption
items.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

items.name: The Dark Knight
items.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

items.name: XXX: Return of Xander Cage
items.description: Xander Cage, left for dead after an incident, is recruited back into action for a new assignment, leading a team of death-defying adrenaline junkies.

items.name: Bloodshot
items.description: Ray Garrison, a slain soldier, is re-animated with superpowers.

items.name: Les Intouchables
items.description: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.
